body_html:
You can do this:

from tensorflow.python.client import device_lib
device_names = [d.name for d in device_lib.list_local_devices()]
self.assertTrue("/gpu:0" in device_names)

On Thu, Jun 9, 2016 at 8:20 AM, Geoffrey Irving notifications@github.com
wrote:

Ah, right. Apologies for poor reading comprehension. That other function
doesn't exist as far as I know.

—

body:
You can do this:

from tensorflow.python.client import device_lib
device_names = [d.name for d in device_lib.list_local_devices()]
self.assertTrue("/gpu:0" in device_names)

On Thu, Jun 9, 2016 at 8:20 AM, Geoffrey Irving notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Ah, right. Apologies for poor reading comprehension. That other function
> doesn't exist as far as I know.
> 
> —
